Message on CHANGE. 

A much needed message for the Body of Christ. 
Let us love each other in spirit and in truth. 

Let’s us not consider each other  in the flesh but always in the spirit for we are spirit beings. And we are ONE BODY. 

Don’t let carnality bring envy, strife and division amongst brethren in the Body . 
The enemy is always seeking whom he may devour. ( to create offense / strife). So be vigilant. 

Offenses which arises in the flesh needs to be taken to the cross. So that we may bear much fruit and grow in maturity as Sons.

Let us transform our minds by the renewing of it in the word of righteousness , which is solid spiritual food.

Sanctify ourselves always with the truth. 
Do not be conformed to the ways of this world, because we are not of this world. 

Allow ourselves to be corrected / chastened by God with the truth so that we may bear the peaceable fruit of righteousness.
We are chastened because He loves us and we love him back by simply believing who He says we are and resting in that truth.

A very enlightening message on Living in the Now. 
What  a revelation ! 

Let us all live in the NOW, every second of our lives. 
Jesus is the I AM , yesterday , today and forever.  And as He is , so are we in this world. 

Let us not be anxious or worried about the future. 
Neither should we keep reminding ourselves of the past . 
For We are New Creations in Christ Jesus. All old things have passed away. 
Everything has become New. 
And the memories of the Righteous are blessed. 

Let the peace of God come upon you . 
Live life in the moment , with expectation of good.
For His plans for you is for a future and hope. 
Cast all your cares on Him, for He carries it for you and His grace is sufficient for each moment . 

This will enable you to push forwards  toward the goal to win the prize for which God has called you heavenward in Christ Jesus . Which will be far more glorious than any of your past experiences . 

Amen.

description:

Prayer : Relationship vs Ritual

Prayer is a relationship with our Heavenly Father. 
Prayer chains are considered deadworks as it is  a tradition/ ritual,  which makes the word of God of no effect. 

You are now a Son of God, the Righteousness of God.
So the Bible says, If a son asks , he receives,if a son seeks he finds, if a son knocks it is opened to him.

He who did not spare his own Son, but gave him up for us all—how will he not also, along with him, graciously give us all things? 

So go directly to your Heavenly Father with your petition. Go boldly to the throne with a clean conscience ( Un-condemned heart ) . Make your petitions known with confidence and wait. It will be answered. 
 
For God hears the prayer of the Righteous 
and the fervent prayer of the Righteous avails much. 

The Holy Spirit in you is the Spirit of Truth and Life, has come to be your Helper. 
Co labour with the Holy Spirit at all times and you will see life in all the difficult situations you encounter.

Remain Seated 🪑 ( He is your Rest )

description:

CTS - The Rest. 

C- Casting Your cares (Not Worrying)
T- Take No Thought
S- Speak

CTS should be the lifestyle of every Son. 

When a situation / crisis arises, a Son does not run , a Son stands knowing who he / she is and confronts the situation ( however big/ however serious it may seem ) , and it will submit to the Son. 

At the name of Jesus ( Son ), every knee shall bow. 

The Holy Spirit / Spirit of Truth / Spirit of Righteousness was sent for our advantage. The Holy Spirit is our Helper, constantly helping and guiding us into all truth. Co - labour with the Holy Spirit in all things and you will reap success . Sons are led by the Holy Spirit at all times.

C- Cast your cares on Him for He cares for you. Because you have a Heavenly Father who loves and your whole life is a finished work. ( It is humility to cast your cares on Him , because you are not an orphan but a loved son ) 

Do not worry. Do not forget what manner of man you are. Do not forget your origin ,that you were born supernaturally from above, and its the Blood relationship ( His righteousness ) that gets the job done. 

T - Take no thought because He thinks for you. You died, it’s Christ who lives in you.  Your life is hidden with Christ in God. 

His thoughts for you are thoughts of peace , to give you a future and a hope.

The warfare take place in the mind. Bring every lie, every stronghold, every argument and every reasoning which is contrary to the Word of God to submit to the Truth ( to what the Word says) , and you will see the disobedience being punished before your eyes.

Meditate ( set your minds )on whatever things are true, whatever things are noble, whatever things are just, whatever things are pure, whatever things are lovely, whatever things are of good report, if there is any virtue and if there is anything praiseworthy. 

S - Speak the Word of God .The Word is the Sword of the Spirit, ( in spiritual warfare ) living and active. We overcome situations by the Blood of the lamb ( through His righteousness which was given to us ) and the Word of our testimony ( what our Father says about us ) . 
Believe it in your heart and confess it with your mouth.

title: REIGNING OVER SICKNESS - PART 3
description:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SbgwQovWvmMkaZZNPZI31xG8xpiMmj07/view?usp=sharing

How to Reign over Sickness. 

Righteousness Consciousness leads to Life. 

Sin Consciousness leads to Condemnation and Death . 

Today we spoke about C-T-S .
Casting your cares, Take No thought and Speak . 



C-CASTING YOUR CARES

Cast your cares unto Him because He cares for you. ( because you are Fathered). 

Rest knowing that you are a Son ( New creation / Godkind). 

Know that the Spirit of Righteousness / Spirit of Life/ The Helper who raised Jesus from the dead , resides in you , constantly giving Eternal / Zoey life to your mortal body through the Holy Spirit. ( expelling / repelling any kind of death in its path ) . 

We were baptized into Christ’s death on the cross and therefore also baptized into Christ’s Ressurection Life . Son’s of God ( that’s you and me ) now hold the keys to HADES and DEATH. Hence, DEATH has absolutely NO POWER or DOMINION over us. 

Just RESTin HIM (the Father) knowing all these truths. ( Just as the branches Rest on the Vine ) and ALL things ( health, prosperity, divine health, relationships etc) will get added to you. ( as the Eternal Life starts flowing from the Vine into the Branches)

T-TAKING NO THOUGHTS 


Bring down every thought , every imagination and every argument in the mind which speaks contrary to who the Word / Father says we are. Do not pursue such thoughts , terminate  it immediately and subject it to the truth ).

The battle lies in the mind. Keep renewing the mind to who the Father  says you are.  
Enlighten your understanding and awaken to your attributes to  who you are as a Son of God. 
As you keep renewing your mind, lies of the enemy get uprooted . As the mind comes in agreement with the Holy Spirit, God’s Eternal life starts flowing into various areas of your lives( in case of sickness and diseases , expelling lying symptoms and death ). 

S-SPEAK

Be single minded about who you are ( that you are a Son of God / New Creatiion, born supernaturally  from above , with the Spirit of Righteousness/ Life/ The Holy Spirit dwelling in you ). 

Believe the Word of God in your heart about who you are . 
And then confess with your mouth. 

The Word of God is the SWORD of the SPIRIT, living and active . It is a discerner of thoughts and removes the lies and wiles of the enemy , so that you may stand victorious on the truth.

The Bible says He who is joined to the lord of One Spirit with Him ... ( In Greek it is translated as One Man with Him ) 
It’s all Christ in You ! *You have a united heart with your Father ❤️ and you can trust your heart *. 

Believe and begin from a place of unity and not separation in your mind, and when you believe you are united and one with him , all things you ‘do’ will reflect that unity.

You are Just like your Father , You have His Heart ❤️

title: The Seed & The Trial - Why do I go through trials
description:
Please use link below to refer to Scripture Verses/ Notes for above message.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/18gFigqat57Y-j2rEFOISBicfey10kln0/view?usp=sharing


In this message, I share about a vision God gave me recently as I was sharing on the series of ‘ Incorruptible seed’ ( Avaiable on YouTube ) In the Vision I saw a farm land set on gentle fire, the purpose was to take out the weeds growing in them. 

Before the seeds are sown and the land is tilled , the farmers burn the land to take out the weeds so that it produces rich soil to yield a rich harvest ( 100 fold). The Bible tells us to “Rejoice in Trials”, as you hear this message you will get a fresh revelation of Gods love for you through your trial and the end result that it produces in you. 

Even though God doesn’t send trials our way , if we co-labour with Him , He can use the trial for our benefit. The only reason a son goes through a trial is because he doesn’t yet see himself as a son in that area and even as you allow yourself to be trained in the process during the trial through His word , you come out victorious👑 You become a partaker of His Divine nature.
